Complete reference¶

garn.saving._read_file_to_wire(wire, file_name)¶

Initialize variables for wire instance from data file.

Internal function that gives the ´wire´ the same properties as the wire used to produce the file ´file_name´

Warning

This method will write over all prior attributes of wire with those specified in the file_name file.

Parameters:

wire : garn.Wire3D or garn.Wire2D

file_name : str
garn.saving.save_to_file(wire, energy, transmission)¶

Save the the energy transmission double Saved as two columns with separation character “space”. Info about wire written to file.
